data.title: About: Hidayat Orujov
data.meta_description: Hidayat Khudush oglu Orujov (Azerbaijani: Hidayət Orucov Xuduş oğlu; born September 5, 1944) is an Azerbaijani writer and politician. He became the Chairman of State Committee for Work with Religious Organizations of Azerbaijan Republic in 2006 and is currently serving as the Azerbaijani ambassador to Kyrgyzstan.
data.text:
dbo:abstract

Hidayat Khudush oglu Orujov (Azerbaijani: Hidayət Orucov Xuduş oğlu; born September 5, 1944) is an Azerbaijani writer and politician. He became the Chairman of State Committee for Work with Religious Organizations of Azerbaijan Republic in 2006 and is currently serving as the Azerbaijani ambassador to Kyrgyzstan. (en)

Hidayat Khudush oglu Orujov (en azéri : Hidayət Orucov Xuduş oğlu) est un écrivain et un homme politique azerbaïdjanais. Il est devenu président du Comité d'État pour le travail avec les organisations religieuses de la République d'Azerbaïdjan en 2006 et est actuellement ambassadeur d'Azerbaïdjan au Kirghizistan . (fr)

Гидаят Худуш оглы Оруджев (азерб. Hidayət Xuduş oğlu Orucov) — азербайджанский поэт, драматург, прозаик, публицист; государственный и общественный деятель Азербайджана; Заслуженный деятель искусств Азербайджана; Государственный советник Азербайджанской Республики 1-го класса. Председатель Государственного комитета по работе с религиозными структурами Азербайджана (2006—2012). Чрезвычайный и Полномочный посол Азербайджанской Республики в Киргизской Республике (с 27 декабря 2012 года). (ru)

He became the Chairman of State Committee for Work with Religious Organizations of Azerbaijan Republic in 2006 and is currently serving as the Azerbaijani ambassador to Kyrgyzstan. (en)
